BD Phoenix™ Automated Microbiology System for use with the antimicrobial agent Ceftaroline (0.0625-4 μg/mL) Gram-positive ID/AST or AST only Phoenix Panels

Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for BD Phoenix™M Automated Microbiology System with Ceftaroline panels for automated antimicrobial susceptibility testing of Gram-positive and Gram-negative bacterial isolates.
Indications for Use Summary: In vitro quantitative determination of antimicrobial susceptibility by minimal inhibitory concentration (MIC) for most Gram-negative and Gram-positive bacterial isolates, including Staphylococcus, Enterococcus, and Streptococcus, using ceftaroline.
